name: Not Home Alone - CASE NO. 13 | Mandela Catalogue Game
name_original: Not Home Alone - CASE NO. 13 | Mandela Catalogue Game
description:
PERSONAL LOG OF Jack R. Macklemore   -   CASE NO. 13   -   CODE NAME   -    FUSE BOX.

WARNING: IF A PARTNER ON YOUR CASE DOES NOT KNOW THE CODE NAME. RUN AS FAR AS YOU CAN AND WAIT FOR ASSISTANCE OR NEUTRALIZE THE ALTERNATE YOURSELF. 

CASE NO.     13    |    ITEM NO.    01    |    DATE FOUND.   10/01/2001   |   

COLLECTED BY.   OFC Macklemore   |   TIME FOUND.    10:36 PM   |   

DESCRIPTION.  Mini dv camera. Slightly damaged.  |   REMARKS. Has video on device.

CASE NO.     13    |    ITEM NO.    01-01    |    DATE FOUND.   10/02/2001   |   

COLLECTED BY.   OFC Macklemore   |   TIME FOUND.    7:41 AM   |   

DESCRIPTION.  Video on camera. About six minutes long.   |   REMARKS. Video camera taken for further investigation by the FBI. Video not seen. Video file title "Home - 09/29/2001"

CASE NO.     13    |    ITEM NO.    02    |    DATE.   10/01/2001   |   

COLLECTED BY.   OFC Macklemore   |   TIME FOUND.    10:46 PM   |   

DESCRIPTION.  Small RC car. Slightly damaged.  |   REMARKS.  Camcorder and flashlight were taped to the RC car.

FINAL REMARKS.   Case 13 as of now seems to be closely related to Case 05 with the toy action figures and the built-in voice boxes. No more evidence in the house was found. No traces to where the family went. Case 13 is another dead end. I managed to upload a copy of the video before the FBI got to it. I need to see what they don't want us to.

SIGN OFF.  OFC Jack R. Macklemore

Submitted to the Brackey's game jam 2022, Theme: You're not alone. The game was made in 7 days, also my first horror game!

The game is based off of the Mandela Catalogue series by Alex Kister. Some audio, images, and video clips are used from his videos for added effect. Thank you, Alex, for making me have heart attacks!
